item.title: Unrealized: The Story of Ike Ibeabuchi, the Great Lost Heavyweight
item.description:
Twenty years ago, Ike "The President" Ibeabuchi announced his candidacy for heavyweight supremacy in spectacular fashion. He seemed destined for a long, violent reign atop boxing's glamour division. But instead, barely two years later, at just 26 years of age, with a perfect record of 20-0, his career was over.
In a special edition of the HBO Boxing Podcast, Eric Raskin spoke to those who knew, worked with, covered, and competed against Ibeabuchi to understand what went wrong and what could have been.
The text version of the oral history "Unrealized: The Story of Ike Ibeabuchi, the Great Lost Heavyweight" is available at: http://fromthevault.hbo.com/ibeabuchi
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ward vs. Kovalev "The Rematch" Pod 1: Fight Preview
item.description:
HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney provide their preview of the Andre Ward vs. Sergey Kovalev light heavyweight title rematch, exploring what's at stake for both fighters and the animosity between the camps before making their predictions on how the action will play out.
Ward vs. Kovalev 2 happens Saturday, June 17 at 9 p.m. ET/6 p.m. PT. The event will be produced and distributed live by HBO Pay-Per-View. Order the fight here: http://www.insidehboboxing.com/wardkovalev2
And get all the Ward vs. Kovalev 2 fight week info at www.insidehboboxing.com.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ward vs. Kovalev "The Rematch" Pod 2: Stat Chat
item.description:
HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney dive deep into the CompuBox numbers for Andre Ward vs. Sergey Kovalev 2 with their Fight Week "Stat Chat," exploring four statistical topics that could determine the outcome of the rematch.
Ward vs. Kovalev 2 happens Saturday, June 17 at 9 p.m. ET/6 p.m. PT. The event will be produced and distributed live by HBO Pay-Per-View. Order the fight here: www.insidehboboxing.com/wardkovalev2

item.description:
HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney dip into the mailbag to answer listener questions about the Andre Ward vs. Sergey Kovalev rematch, covering everything from how aggressive Kovalev should be to what it would take for this to lead to a third fight.
Ward vs. Kovalev 2 happens Saturday, June 17 at 9 p.m. ET/6 p.m. PT. The event will be produced and distributed live by HBO Pay-Per-View. Order the fight here: www.insidehboboxing.com/wardkovalev2

item.title: Ward vs. Kovalev "The Rematch" Pod 4: Live From Radio Row Day 1
item.description:
HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney are live from Radio Row at Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas as Andre Ward vs. Sergey Kovalev 2 fight week rolls on, covering the final press conference and welcoming guests Michael Yormark of Roc Nation, Ward cutman Jacob "Stitch" Duran, Kovalev trainer John David Jackson and MGM sports book executive Jeff Stonebeck.
Ward vs. Kovalev 2 happens Saturday, June 17 at 9 p.m. ET/6 p.m. PT. The event will be produced and distributed live by HBO Pay-Per-View. Order the fight here: www.insidehboboxing.com/wardkovalev2
And get all of the Ward vs. Kovalev 2 fight week info at www.insidehboboxing.com

item.title: Ward vs. Kovalev "The Rematch" Pod 5: Live From Radio Row Day 2
item.description:
HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney return to Radio Row at the Mandalay Bay to cover the Andre Ward vs. Sergey Kovalev 2 weigh-in, answer a few listener questions in a bonus mini-mailbag, and interview Roy Jones, Jim Lampley, Vaughn Alexander and Bayern Munich/Germany soccer player Jerome Boateng.
Ward vs. Kovalev 2 happens Saturday, June 17 at 9 p.m. ET/6 p.m. PT. The event will be produced and distributed live by HBO Pay-Per-View. Order the fight here: www.insidehboboxing.com/wardkovalev2

item.title: Ward vs. Kovalev "The Rematch": Post-Fight Analysis
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney break down Andre Ward's eighth-round TKO win over Sergey Kovalev, analyzing the timing of referee Tony Weeks' stoppage, Ward's pound-for-pound status and where both boxers go from here. Plus, they dissect the madness of Guillermo Rigondeaux's highly controversial undercard victory.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Episode 193: Talking Boxing Photography with Ed Mulholland Plus Latest News and Info
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney are joined by photographer Ed Mulholland for an in-depth conversation about the art of boxing photography. Plus, they reflect a week later on the Ward vs. Kovalev 2 and Rigondeaux vs. Flores results -- the latter of which was overturned -- and look ahead to a few outstanding cards recently added to the schedule.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Episode 194: Mid-Year Awards
item.description: At the mid-point of 2017, HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney reveal their picks for the HBO Mid-Year Awards, covering everything from Fight and Fighter of the Half-Year to Gutsiest and Least Gutsy Losing Efforts of the Half-Year.

item.title: Episode 195: Miguel Berchelt vs. Takashi Miura Preview
item.description:
HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney preview all three fights on this Saturday's Boxing After Dark tripleheader, including Miguel Berchelt vs. Takashi Miura, Jezreel Corrales vs. Robinson Castellanos, and Joe Smith Jr. vs. Sullivan Barrera.
Tune in to the action Saturday, July 15 beginning at 9:50 p.m. ET/PT on HBO.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep. 196: Berchelt vs. Miura Postfight
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney analyze all the action from Saturday night's tripleheader at The Forum, including Miguel Berchelt's decisive win over Takashi Miura, Jezreel Corrales' less decisive win over Robinson Castellanos, and Sullivan Barrera's off-the-deck domination of Joe Smith Jr.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep. 197: Midsummer Mailbag
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney talk about Kieran's recent trips to Gennady Golovkin's and Canelo Alvarez's training camps. Plus, they open up the mailbag to answer listener questions about boxing's judging problem, the September 9 "Super Fly" card, the best fights never made, and much more.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep. 198: Top 10 Middleweight Fights
item.description:
In anticipation of the September 16 middleweight championship showdown between Canelo Alvarez and Gennady "GGG" Golovkin, HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney rank the 10 biggest middleweight fights in HBO boxing history.
Canelo vs. Golovkin takes place Saturday, Sept. 16 at 8 p.m. ET/5 p.m. PT and will be produced and distributed live by HBO Pay-Per-View.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep. 199: Upcoming Fights with Rafe Bartholomew
item.description: HBO Boxing Insider Eric Raskin is joined by guest co-host Rafe Bartholomew as they ask and answer questions about all of the fight cards on the loaded August/September HBO Boxing schedule, including the Canelo Alvarez vs. Gennady Golovkin mega-event and the September 9 "Super Fly" tripleheader.

item.title: Ep. 200: Klitschko, Marquez, and Bradley Retirements
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney celebrate their 200th episode by looking back on the careers of recently retired warriors Wladimir Klitschko, Juan Manuel Marquez, and Tim Bradley, discussing their most memorable fights, best performances, and Hall of Fame credentials.

item.title: Ep. 201: Cotto vs. Kamegai Preview
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney preview Saturday's Miguel Cotto vs. Yoshihiro Kamegai fight, analyzing what Cotto's retirement plans mean, how career-long layoffs will affect both combatants, and what style of fight gives Kamegai his best chance. They also talk about the "StubHub magic" potential of the co-featured bout, Rey Vargas vs. Ronny Rios.

item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney recap the action from Miguel Cotto's entertaining beatdown of Yoshihiro Kamegai and speculate on who else Cotto might face before he retires, plus they discuss Rey Vargas' undercard victory over Ronny Rios.

item.title: Ep. 203: Super Fly Preview

item.title: Ep 213: Linares - Campbell Postfight
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney share their thoughts on Jorge Linares' split decision win over Luke Campbell, plus they discuss the Canelo-GGG scoring (again), Daniel Jacobs' big career move, the deaths of Jake La Motta and Joe Carnicelli, and the sudden retirement of Andre Ward.

item.title: Ep 214: Ward and Mosley Retirements
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney reflect on the careers of 2017 retirees Sugar Shane Mosley and Andre Ward, selecting their most memorable fights and greatest performances and discussing whether both are first-ballot Hall of Famers.

item.title: Ep 215: Jacobs-Arias Press Conference and News Roundup
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney dissect several recent news items, including what went down at the Daniel Jacobs-Luis Arias press conference, which names on the International Boxing Hall of Fame ballot are deserving of induction, Miguel Cotto's selection of Sadam Ali as a farewell opponent, and Jim Lampley remaining the voice of HBO boxing for the foreseeable future.

item.title: Ep 216: Corrales vs. Machado Tripleheader Preview
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney preview the October 21 split-site tripleheader, assessing what to expect in Jezreel Corrales vs. Alberto Machado, Demetrius Andrade vs. Alantez Fox, and Ryan Burnett vs. Zhanat Zhakiyanov.

item.title: Ep. 217: Machado-Corrales Tripleheader Recap
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney break down Alberto Machado's stunning come-from-behind upset knockout win over Jezreel Corrales, Demetrius Andrade's workmanlike performance against Alantez Fox, and Ryan Burnett's gutty victory over Zhanat Zhakiyanov as part of the Oct. 21 HBO Boxing After Dark tripleheader.

item.title: Ep 221: Kovalev vs. Shabranskyy Preview

item.title: Ep. 222: Kovalev vs. Shabranskyy Postfight
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney discuss what they learned from Sergey Kovalev's destructive second-round knockout win over Vyacheslav Shabranskyy, plus they analyze Sullivan Barrera's hard-earned win over Felix Valera and Yuriorkis Gamboa's controversial triumph over Jason Sosa.

item.title: Ep. 223: Cotto vs. Ali Preview
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney preview Puerto Rican boxing icon Miguel Cotto's farewell fight against Sadam Ali at Madison Square Garden and look back on some of their favorite Cotto fights and memories.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep. 224: Cotto-Ali Postfight and Salido-Roman Preview
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney reflect on Sadam Ali's upset win in Miguel Cotto's farewell fight, discuss what the future holds for Ali, pay tribute to future Hall of Famer Cotto, and look ahead to the December 9 tripleheader in Las Vegas headlined by Orlando Salido vs. Miguel Roman.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Episode 225: Salido - Roman Postfight, Saunders-Lemieux Preview
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney preview Saturday’s tripleheader headlined by the David Lemieux-Billy Joe Saunders middleweight showdown, look back on this past weekend’s Boxing After Dark card that included a Fight of the Year candidate between Miguel Roman and Orlando Salido and a horrific injury to Stephen Smith, and touch briefly on the announcement of the 2018 International Boxing Hall of Fame induction class.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep. 226: Lemieux vs. Sanders Postfight
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney break down all of Saturday night's action from Montreal, including Billy Joe Saunders' magnificent boxing display against David Lemieux, Spike O'Sullivan's knockout of Antoine Douglas, and Yves Ulysse Jr.'s dominant performance against Cletus Seldin.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: The Prince and the Flash: The Story of Naseem Hamed vs. Kevin Kelley
item.description:
Twenty years ago, an undefeated, power-punching British featherweight of Yemeni descent named “Prince” Naseem Hamed brought his show to America for the first time when he faced his toughest professional test, New Yorker Kevin Kelley, a.k.a. “The Flushing Flash,” at Madison Square Garden. The hype was off the charts. And the fight exceeded all hype.
In a special edition of the HBO Boxing Podcast, Eric Raskin speaks to numerous insiders who were connected to Hamed or Kelley or were inside the Garden that night and lets them tell the story of one of the wildest fights of the era, a brawl that shook up the way smaller fighters were perceived and the pay scale they were working under.
The text version of the oral history "The Prince and the Flash: The Story of Naseem Hamed vs. Kevin Kelley" is available at: fromthevault.hbo.com/hamedkelley
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep 228: 2017 Year-End Awards
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney announce the podcast's 2017 year-end award winners, including HBO Fighter of the Year, Fight of the Year, WTF Moment of the Year, and more. They also follow up on last week's Naseem Hamed-Kevin Kelley oral history podcast with a few of Eric's memories from ringside at Madison Square Garden 20 years ago.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep 229: Morales, Klitschko and Wright Defining Fights
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney count down and analyze the defining fights in the careers of new Hall of Famers Erik Morales, Vitali Klitschko, and Winky Wright.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep 230: January Mailbag
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney open up the mailbag, answering fan questions about how to keep boxing's momentum going, top up-and-coming UK fighters, divisions worthy of a "Superfly"-style fight card, and much more.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep 231: Matthysse-Kiram and Linares-Gesta Preview
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney preview this Saturday's Boxing After Dark doubleheader, providing analysis and predictions for the welterweight clash between Lucas Matthysse and Tewa Kiram and the lightweight fight pitting Jorge Linares against Mercito Gesta.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep 232: GGG - Canelo 2 Announcement, Matthysse - Kiram, Linares - Gesta Postfight
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney weigh in on the major breaking news announcement that Canelo Alvarez vs. Gennady Golovkin 2 has been signed for May 5 on HBO Pay-Per-View, then they analyze Lucas Matthysse's eighth-round knockout of Tewa Kiram and Jorge Linares' unanimous decision win over Mercito Gesta.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Episode 233: GGG - Canelo 2 Early Mini Preview, Super Bowl Philly Boxing Talk
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney offer up an early preview of the Gennady Golovkin-Canelo Alvarez middleweight championship rematch, exploring a couple of numbers to know and asking each other some burning questions. They also discuss the Philadelphia Eagles' Super Bowl victory and draw parallels with a handful of the best Philly fighters of recent decades.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep 234: Tom Loeffler Interview
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney sit down with promoter Tom Loeffler for a discussion covering the Gennady Golovkin-Canelo Alvarez rematch set for May 5, the stacked Superfly 2 card on February 24, and the legacies of the Klitschko brothers.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing

item.title: Ep 235: Little Guys Draft
item.description: HBO Boxing Insiders Eric Raskin and Kieran Mulvaney kick off the countdown to the Feb. 24 Superfly 2 card by engaging in a "Little Guys Snake Draft," assembling fantasy teams of the best 115-pound-and-below fighters of the last 25 years.
item.itunes:author: HBO Boxing
